description:
While Kaiba combines the magnetic menace XYZ-Dragon Cannon for unmatched attack power, Yugi only has one lowly Queen`s Knight to protect himself!  Even worse, Kaiba has all the monsters necessary to summon Obelisk the Tormentor to finish Yugi off!  Though overwhelmed and outmatched, nothing is going to stop Yugi from trying to summon his Egyptian God first!
Source: crunchyroll
